data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oca, Adrian Nieto-Montes de, Sanchez-Vega, Helder, Duran-Fuentes, Itzel (2018): A new species of knob-scaled lizard (Xenosauridae, Xenosaurus) from the Sierra Madre Oriental of Puebla, Mexico. ZooKeys 737: 141-160, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.737.15095, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.737.15095
